part.content: CHAPTER IV : ATTRIBUTION, ACKNOWLEDGEMENT AND DESPATCH OF ELECTRONIC RECORDS. Sec. 11 - 13.
CHAPTER V : SECURE ELECTRONIC RECORDS AND SECURE DIGITAL SIGNATURES. Sec. 14 - 16.
CHAPTER VI : REGULATION OF CERTIFYING AUTHORITIES. Sec. 17 - 34.
CHAPTER VII : DIGITAL SIGNATURE CERTIFICATES. Sec. 35 - 39.
CHAPTER VIII : DUTIES OF SUBSCRIBERS. Sec. 40 42.
CHAPTER IX : PENALTIES AND ADJUDICATION. Sec. 43 - 47.
CHAPTER X : THE CYBER REGULATIONS APPELLATE TRIBUNAL. Sec. 48 - 64.
CHAPTER XII : NETWORK SERVICE PROVIDERS NOT TO BE LIABLE IN CERTAIN CASES. Sec. 79.
